TopicTitle: KSP Stock X-Wing and Xtra-Wing SSTOs

Articles.Content:
Yes, that is how it's done, unless you didn't use Steam and installed KSP somewhere else ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) No worries though, I doubt anyone would get tripped up by this point.

Oh, and the actual ship is nice too xD

Thank you, and yeah I tried it myself and it worked. I prefer this over using an upload site for what is basically a .txt document ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Wow, that thing looks glamorous!

Repped!

The Xtra-Wing makes orbit!

![umlMiZH.png](http://i.imgur.com/umlMiZH.png)

Granted, it's a measly 85x85 orbit with only a full FLT-400 fuel tank as cargo (and I used up 100 units of monopropellant completing the burn, as well as all my LF), but then I did that on an outright impatient 40 degree ascent path to space.
